params.amount: The amount of liquidity to add for the router
params.assetId: The address (or `address(0)` if native asset) of the                asset you're adding liquidity for

getActiveTransactionsByUser(address).details: returns all active transactions for a given user

chainId.details: The chain id of the contract, is passed in to avoid any evm issues

multisend.details: Address of the deployed multisending helper contract
